title: Frequent ping spikes...
body:
I recieve frequent ping spikes during my matches on league (even as the only one on the internet)
normally would have a steady 35ms connection but now it frequently jumps to 400+ for a brief moment then lowers again.
anyone else having this issue? the game is pretty much unplayable with this happening :/

replies.body:
What ISP are you with - also do you connect to your router via wifi or cable?

It would be good if you can run the [network diagnostic tool](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs) and submit the results as well.

-Mindstar

Had a quick search of the forums and I think I am experiencing a similar problem to others. For the past 2 weeks I have been getting between 5 and 20 ping spikes in every game where my ping goes up to around 300-400 and rarely I will freeze up completely. I am with Telstra and I have submitted the network logs. Same issue with cable and wifi. 
Any fix yet?

My ISP is iiNet and i mainly play on WiFi but cable produces the same results.
I've tried asking my ISP about this issue but they insist that there is no issue with their network.
There was some issues people were having yesterday with lag in game, and it was the server's fault. Wonder if that's still happening.
